text: ao mcheasa robsa yeungokhnhom. pitabrakd nasa khnhom banaoy kaunchaw robsakhnhom muoychamnuon rsanow ti chrolongophnom del kmean damnam tealtesaoh now e pei tol laoh . ao mcheasa robsa yeungokhnhom. ( khnhom brate b tde tam trong dauch nih) ku daembi aoy puokke brate b tde sa la t . dau che neah saum trong me tda thveu aoy duong chetd mnoussa lok muoychamnuon chaul chetd puokke ning bratan leaph sakkar dl puokke nouv phokophl neanea phng daembi puokke nung doengkoun
